metadata.Title: CVE-2012-1088 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - negligible
metadata.Description:
iproute2 before 3.3.0 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via asymlink attack on a temporary file used by (1) configure or (2)examples/dhcp-client-script.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-1088` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

iproute2 - 3.12.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: iproute2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.12.0-2').
